Name: Sprachrohr de Sancta Maria
Notes: auf Psalmen von Hildegard von Bingen f체r Ms, FI, VI, Vc und Klav fue 6160
Long Description: Sprachrohr de Sancta Maria is a composition by Carmen Maria C창rneci from 1997, based on psalms by Hildegard von Bingen. It is scored for mezzo soprano, flute, violin, violoncello, and piano, with a duration of 13 minutes. The work includes sections titled Initio: Quia ergo femina..., Repercussio: O viridissima virga..., Flexa (sic flectitur): Cum erbuerint..., Mediatio (sic mediatur); Hodie aperuit nobis..., and Terminatio (et sic finitur): O viridissima virga.
Short Description: A composition based on psalms by Hildegard von Bingen for mezzo soprano, flute, violin, violoncello, and piano.
